title: How to write ten billion, four hundred and two million, eight hundred and one thousand, two hundred in figure - Quora

response.answer_text: A) 10,000,000,400 B) 2,000,800 C) 1,200 That is in US English, some languages use periods instead of commas. In some languages billion has a different meaning A) would be 10.000.000.000.400. Quora prefers multipart questions to be asked seperatly. On the off chance you added “and"s that you didn't mean it would be 10,402,801,200. Or possibly 10.000.402.801.200. There are a lot of these questions, would you satisfy my curiosity of why you ask?
